entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY ENDED, Cambridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:10 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and late this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 08:09 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 08:09 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:09 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
